rules.description: Caps Lock: tap for Esc, hold for third layer
Third layer: Quotes and Curly Braces
Caps Lock: tap for Esc, hold for Ctrl
N key as layer modifier (N becomes modifier only)
N Layer: Navigation arrows (S=left, T=right, N=down, E=up)
N Layer: Brackets (Q=[, W=], F={, P=}, A=(, R=))
N Layer: Quotes and Special chars (V=", M=', G=:, K=^, I=", O=')
Move Z to [ and ] keys (like Linux layout)
